Tips for learning HSS prarthna
This app has 3 buttona PLAY, PAUSE and REWIND (last 10 seconds). We have purposefully not used Forward or audio scrolling button to help listen full prarthna each time for a quick way to learn and remember.
Prathna consist of 8 stanza
1. Play Prathna and keep attention on on screen subtitle - stanza after stanza. Repeat it for few times. This will help to understand pronounciation of each word in a stanza and pace and rithm of stanza 2. Once you become familiar with each stanza and pronounciation of most difficult words, play it again. This time after listening audio and viewing each subtitle, PAUSE for a while and sing loudly the part of stanza on the screen. After it hit play or pause button again and continue listening and viewing the next stanza and again PAUSE it and again sing aloud from the subtitle on screen or from the mind has remmbered the last stanza. Continute this PAUSE and PLAY cycle for all 8 stanza. If needed continute this cycle for whole prarthan for a few more times 3. While in PAUSE if forget the tune and ridham of the stanza just listened then make use of Rewind button. The Rewind button can be played while in Pause or in Play. It will re-play lasy 10 seconds audio (subtitle will not be rewinded). The replaying will allow to master tune and ridham of difficult stanzas.
